00026 /// \ingroup (enums)
00027 /// \brief
00028 /// The FdoLockStrategy enumeration defines how lock acquisition should proceed.
00029 enum FdoLockStrategy
00030 {
00031     /// Declares that either all of the locks must be acquired or none should be acquired.
00032     FdoLockStrategy_All,
00033     /// Declares that all of the locks that can be acquired should be acquired.
00034     FdoLockStrategy_Partial
00035 
00036 };
00037 #endif
